name: SoulBind (Nic Hodges)
description:
Controls:

WASD to Move
Mouse to Look around

Hold Left click over broken robots to SoulBind with them

Right click on a SoulBound robot to disable the SoulBind

Hold left click to fire towards the mouse

Do be aware that SoulBinding with robots does cost SoulContainers


Types of bots:

Turret Bot - Fires bullets when the mouse is held down. Is a very hard wearing bot.

Shield Bot - Generates a shield on left click that can block incoming bullets and is fired when left click is released. Very fragile.

Story:

The BotNet has gone crazy and is creating deadly robots all over the land. Use your soul binding abilities to destroy the BotNet and save humanity.

Notes:

I had a ton of fun working on this for the game jam and as such am planning on making a full release with more bots and environments to explore. If you're interested in the full release be sure to follow me on itch.io at https://nichodges.itch.io/

Hope you enjoy SoulBind!
